title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream

preview.html: Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman is one of the dreams that fills the heart with joy and happiness. As for seeing the Crown Prince giving money to the banner in a dream, does its meaning indicate good or bad, or is there another meaning behind this dream? In the following lines, we explain all the details to reassure the hearts of dreamers about it. Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream. Interpretation experts said that seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream is one of the desired visions that carries many positive meanings and meanings that indicate the dreamer’s arrival to the highest ranks in the country. As for seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman angry in a man’s dream, this indicates that the dreamer does many bad and bad things to a great extent, and this always distances him from his Lord. A man dreams that he is sitting and talking with Prince Mohammed bin Salman while he is sleeping, so this is a sign that God He will fill his life and shower his blessings and blessings on him in the coming periods. Whereas, if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is hugging and kissing Prince Mohammed bin Salman, this means that he will obtain a prestigious job through which he will have a large business. Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream for his son Shirin Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream is one of those dreams that brings the dreamer a lot of sustenance to come in the coming days. But if the dreamer sees himself sitting on the throne with Prince Mohammed bin Salman in his dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a great position in his field of work. He wins the love and respect of all the people who work with him because of his good heart and purity. Whereas if the Caliph, whom the dreamer sees in his dream, lives in a different country, this indicates that the dreamer will immigrate soon and there God will bless him greatly. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a specialized website. In the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman in a dream from Nablus. Seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will achieve many goals and ambitions that will make him a successful future. As the great scholar Al-Nabulsi said, seeing the Crown Prince in a dream shows that the dreamer has many abilities that make him succeed in anything and overcome all difficult adversities and crises. A man dreams that Prince Mohammed bin Salman was seriously injured during his sleep, so this is a sign that the visionary has been exposed to many... Problems and pain during this period of his life. Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a single dream. The interpretation of Prince Mohammed bin Salman seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is an indication of the approaching date of her marriage to a young man who has many good qualities that make him capable of providing a life of peace and comfort. Seeing The Crown Prince also in a girl’s dream means that the person who will marry the dreamer will be a wealthy young man who has an important position in society. A single woman dreams during her sleep that Prince Mohammed bin Salman gives her a gift, this indicates that she is making every effort

title: Interpretation of snakes in a dream: Seeing a snake in a dream

preview.html: SnakeSeeing a snake in a dream and killing itInterpretation of a dream about a large snakeInterpretation of a dream about small snakesA snake bite in a dreamBlack snake in a dreamYellow snake in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about many snakesInterpretation of a dream about a snake chasing meThe snake in a dream expresses many things: it is an enemy, a state, life, a torrent, a boy and a woman. The color that We see it as very important in the interpretation of these dreams, as the black color usually represents an enemy or something similar, and the green colors mean the appearance of rain or the appearance of a torrent or good. Seeing snakes in dreams and the interpretation of these dreams depends on what we saw in the dream. The dream cannot be interpreted unless we know the shape and color of the snake and what the snake and the person who had the dream did so that we can interpret it accurately and with dignity. For example, whoever sees that he killed a snake in his bed, his wife will die. Whoever sees his pregnant woman giving birth to a snake, he will have a disaster. Whoever sees a dead snake, he is an enemy, and God will save him from its evil, from its bite. A snake gets money because poison is money and size increases it. Whoever sees that he is eating live, cooked meat takes his enemy’s money. Whoever eats it raw repels his enemy. Whoever sees a snake descending from a high place, this means the death of the leader of that place. Whoever sees a snake swallowing it, gains power or prestige. Whoever sees that he bypasses snakes and does not bite him. He is safe from his enemies despite his imprisonment and release from prison. A snake in a dream indicates hostility from parents, spouses, or children. Perhaps he was a jealous or evil neighbor. Whoever sees that he has a snake, this is evidence that he will have strength. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees a dead snake, this means that God is sufficient for him from the evil of his enemy, and whoever sees many snakes being killed, this means that he will fight his enemies and be victorious. And whoever sees that there is a snake on his neck and cuts it Into three pieces, it means that he will divorce his wife three times. Whoever sees that a snake is walking behind him, then there is an enemy who wants to conspire against him. If you walk in front of him or next to him, they are enemies mixed with him and cannot harm him. It indicates the presence of someone who is trying to harm you and harass you, and you must control your fear and haste so that you can triumph over your enemies and those who hate you, and choose your friends in the right way and stay away from evil. Friends and people with special interests, and more than a remembrance of God to protect you from the evil and harm of others. Seeing snakes in a dream varies according to their color and shape. They are white or black. They may represent women, they may be bad women, they may be good women, they may be a good wife, they may be workers and treasure hoarders. This is based on my humble reading of the interpretation of dreams, but I cannot explain the good in reality, but this is the opinion of snakes in a dream in general. If you see that you were bitten by a snake and did not feel pain, then know that you are in the company of those who hate you. And if you see that you have been bitten by a snake and you are in pain from the effect of the bite, know that you are sleeping with a traitor who is harming you with her actions. If you see that you are accustomed to a snake and its cultivation, know that you will control the enemy of the Dao. If you see that you are among many snakes, know that you live with someone who hates you and hates you and that you arouse the envy of others and make them shine.

title: Interpretation of a dream about locusts for a married or unmarried woman

preview.html: In this article on the interpretation of dreams, we will continue our discussion or interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for single and married women, after we covered in the previous article the interpretation of a dream about locusts according to the approach of Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. In this article, we will study with you a number of expressions or interpretations related to seeing locusts in a dream. Women, where we learn about the meaning of locusts in the home, and the meanings accompanying the locust attack on married and single women... The meaning of killing locusts in a dream along with many other manifestations related to locusts in a woman’s dream in general... We wish you an interesting and useful continuation of the topic. Locusts in One dream: Locusts in a person’s dream differ in interpretation according to many events, as a large number of locusts indicates problems and fears, especially if an unmarried woman sees them invading her home, room, or place of work. A large number of locusts in an unmarried girl’s dream is considered praiseworthy if the locusts sway and do not attack. It does not attack... In this state or situation, many locusts indicate the abundance of food and abundance or the year that some desire. .. Especially if the color of grasshoppers in the dream is green. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream as if a place full of grasshoppers fluttering inside each other, this is a sign of worsening worries and increasing crises. Grasshoppers mean mobs and gossip, especially if their color is black, gray, or red. Or orange. As for pink locusts, they are good and wonderful news for a girl or girl. If an unmarried girl sees grasshoppers crossing the sea or river, this is in the interpretation of travel, support, or assistance, and grasshoppers in the sea often indicate food and abundance. If an unmarried woman sees in Her dream is that the sky is raining locusts, so there is nothing good in this dream because it expresses suffering, epidemic, or drought... except that the locusts are made of gold or silver, so its interpretation is better. It indicates sustenance, engagement or marriage. If an unmarried woman sees locusts in her bed, she will marry a soldier or a soldier, and a wild grasshopper is a virtuous woman, it is not bad to see her in a dream. If an unmarried woman sees a dead man eating the corpse of his grasshopper, these are the fears he left The dead man before his death may relate to his children... Perhaps this vision refers to the struggle of his brothers and sisters among the children of the grasshopper. If a single woman sees locusts in her closet or bag, then this is her interpretation of money and many things. Goodness...If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that locusts are attacking her house, this means fears, conflicts, or rivalries. Killing locusts is praiseworthy in one dream because it is an expression of victory, victory, control and success. Locusts in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees locusts entering her house safely, this is a good interpretation. She saw that she was cooking or eating, because it is good for them to fill her house and make her very happy. But...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a full pregnancy in a dream for married women, single women, pregnant women, and men?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream is complete according to the books of major scholars, interpretations of dreams and visions, as well as everything related to the interpretation in a dream about pregnancy in a dream, and it is complete for married women, the elderly, and pregnant women. Women as well as men through the Trend website specialized in the sciences of interpretation and jurisprudence. Why dream of pregnancy from Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried girl seeing herself pregnant in a dream and not being satisfied with this pregnancy indicates that she is suffering from psychological pressures and problems that affect her. Seeing a pregnant woman in In the dream, she is full and cries a lot - this indicates that she has committed a great sin, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a Caesarean section in a complete dream? Why does a married woman dream of being pregnant? Why does a married woman dream of a pregnancy that is not pregnant? This indicates that in a married woman’s dream, this indicates Lack of money and bad luck. Interpretation of dreams for a married pregnant woman with children indicates the abundance of food and goodness that the dreamer will obtain, and God knows best. See also: Why does a male child dream of a full-fledged dream? Why do you dream of an absolute pregnancy? When a divorced woman dreams of herself during pregnancy, this is good news for her and her good husband. Also, seeing a divorced woman in a dream full of pregnancy indicates the possibility of returning to her husband, ending disputes, and improving relations between them, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is completely different from one person to another, and seeing a pregnant woman in a dream full of clouds is evidence of marriage. Close and means of livelihood, and for a married woman, this indicates the imminence of pregnancy, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a girl in a dream who is full? Why dream of a virgin pregnancy? They say that if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream who is full during pregnancy, it depends on whether this woman Religious. If the girl in the dream is not religious, this indicates the tension and suffering that the girl will experience in her life, and God knows best. Why does a man dream that he is pregnant? Seeing a man in a dream full of himself and pregnant as a woman is one of the unpleasant visions for him and indicates trouble and sadness In his next life. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a black child in a dream? Why do you dream of pregnancy without marriage? And the girl’s view of herself while she is pregnant outside of marriage, Ibn Shaheen interpreted it as perhaps good news for her and an imminent marriage, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, Leave it in the comments below and our team will get back to you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, as the rainbow is considered one of the mysterious natural phenomena in its physical and chemical nature, as the rainbow appears after rain if the rays of the sun fall on it, so the seven colors are reflected, which is what is known as the rainbow. The interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream is in the minds of many people, which led them to wonder about it. It is noteworthy that every dream has two aspects of interpretation, which is the praise side, so that the dream brings good news. And some of them carry a good omen, and we will show you the details in our article. Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream A rainbow is considered one of the natural phenomena that occurs after the end of the rain, and the sun’s rays fall on these drops immediately, resulting in a rainbow reflection called a rainbow. It is worth noting that there is There are many dreams that people have during their sleep, which include seeing a rainbow, and in the following lines we will confirm the interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream and mention some different interpretations, which are: Seeing a rainbow in a dream and its colors are full, and this is an expression of marriage soon, whether for a young man or a girl, God willing. Also, seeing a rainbow in a dream is closely related to struggle, hope, good luck, and perseverance over problems that may befall a person. In addition, a person who dreams of raising his financial level when he sees a rainbow in a dream, this indicates that he has reached the end of this exhaustion and that The time has come to achieve what he wants, which is manifested in raising the material level, and in living the life that he wants and longs for. Also, seeing a rainbow in a dream in general can indicate a magic mirror that speaks of good things that will happen to you in your life, and God Almighty is Most High and Knows. The unseen. See also: Interpretation of seeing the cross by Ibn Sirin or Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin presented many interpretations that differ in dreams and visions, as the interpretations differ depending on the condition of the dreamer, in addition to the general condition in which he lives, and the Imam relied on the interpretation To some of the connotations, symbols and suggestions present in the vision, we mention some of them: the interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream by Ibn Sirin, including: Sheikh Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a rainbow in a dream is a good thing, as it expresses positivity in one’s life, and that God Almighty will fulfill one’s dreams in addition to increasing His livelihood is with the help of God Almighty. It was also mentioned that seeing the color of the rainbow has different interpretations depending on the color that appeared. Seeing a rainbow in a dream and its color is predominantly green, this is evidence of the security that accompanies this person, in addition to the distance from injustice and drought throughout his life, and it will be He is safe from the oppression of the rulers if he is tyrannical and oppresses everyone, and God knows best. If the color yellow appears in the dream, this is an indication that the dreamer is infected with diseases, and the epidemic will affect his family and affect them greatly, and this epidemic will also spread. In the whole city, as it will affect the whole city, and many people will be affected by it. We find that Ibn Sirin believed that seeing a rainbow in a dream in general

title: Interpretation of a dream about killing a dead friend

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing a dead friend on different occasions. A person cannot die twice in reality, because in this worldly life it only happens on the Day of Resurrection, when God Almighty orders the blowing of images to begin the reckoning. After the reckoning, there is a new life in which there is no death at all. This happens in a dream, and a person can see the death of the deceased again, or the fortuneteller discovers that he is killing a dead person, and this dream certainly has many connotations that we learn about today through this article on the site. Encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about killing a dead person in a dream:The interpretation of seeing a dead person being killed in a dream varies, depending on whether the dead person is related to the fortuneteller or not, a woman.If the fortuneteller finds in a dream that he is killing his friend who God has already died, and the fortuneteller sees people crying over him This crying is free of screaming and lamentation, as this is evidence that one of the relatives or friends. The children of the deceased will get married soon, and if the fortuneteller is a friend of the deceased, his grandchildren are also happy with the marriage. People crying over the dead who die again in a dream indicates joy and happiness. Crying heralds the coming of relief, God willing, and the end of the troubles and crises that the dreamer suffered from, and in the event that The fortuneteller's disease. This is a sign of his recovery, God willing. In the event that we see the death of the deceased again and this death is accompanied by cries and lamentations for his death, then this vision is not praiseworthy at all, as it indicates the death of a family member of this deceased or a member of his family. Relatives. Or members of his family, and it may be a sign of the dreamer’s misfortunes if he is related to the dead person. If the dreamer kills a dead person in a dream and people do not feel sorry for him and do not prepare a funeral for him or do not carry out the duty of condolences, then this is also a vision that does not bode well at all, as it may indicate If his house falls, demolishes it, or demolishes part of it, but in the case of burying the dead person in the dream without any sign of sadness, because this vision may indicate the recovery of what fell from the house, and it may indicate that the people of the house left it and lived in another place. If the dead person was killed in a way Terrible, this is evidence that the place where this happened will cause a fire or one of the biggest disasters in it. Relaxing in his bed or sitting is a sign that the fortuneteller will enjoy great status among men. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream: The interpretation of seeing a murder in a dream varies, whether it is logical or not, and this is due to the psychological state of the viewer and his feelings towards the person who killed him, and the tool used. In killing, it can lead to a difference in the interpretation of the whole dream. He will face and pass safely, God willing. title: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for single and married people. Onions have many interpretations if seen in a dream, because they can have different colors, different smells, and completely different situations. In the following article, we tell you more about the interpretation of seeing onions in a dream.Interpretation of seeing onions in a dreamWhen a traveler sees onions in a dream, this means that he will reach his destination safely.Seeing patient’s tumorsIf a patient sees in a dream that he is eating onions, many experts in dream interpretation have interpreted it. However, God will die, and God knows best, of course, but these are interpretations. Some interpreters also believe that seeing onions in a dream in general is evidence of the great destiny that God Almighty bestows on this person. But if the sick person sees that he is eating onions in a dream, this is evidence of a speedy recovery. God willing. But if a non-religious or unrelated person dreams of onions, this means that he is collecting illegal money. As for someone who dreams that he is eating onions, but after they are cooked and cooked well, this means that he is on the right path, and is evidence that he will return to God. Blessed and Most High, and he repents. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dreamWhen the sleeper dreams of green onions, this means that God, the Blessed and Most High, will bless him with many children or money, but he must first work hard. As for the one who sees that there are a lot of green onions in a field, this means - God knows - he will have a very big and strong competitor. She is wearing an onion display, but he cannot stay away from that, and this means that he will get a lot of food soon, but first he will get something difficult. Explain the method of peeling an onion. Whoever sees in his dream that he peels an onion, this means that he will He compliments someone and compliments him. Interpretation of seeing cutting onions: Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting onions, then tears flow, meaning that his competitors will be able to defeat him, and God knows best. As for those who see onions in abundance in a dream, this means that the person is subject to a strong desire that will negatively affect his His life.Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s dream of seeing onions. Whoever dreams of eating cooked onions and its meaning, and God knows that the outcome of his condition will lead to repentance. The habit of eating onions in a dream is either forbidden money, want and regret, or obscene talk and a little debt. , hidden things, or was it a bad question. We told you a set of interpretations of seeing onions in a dream in different colors, shapes and conditions, and in the end they are all from scholars of jurisprudence, whether they came from the interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin, the great scholar. . Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen, but all knowledge belongs to God Almighty, and we must follow only the straight path, no matter how different the scientific interpretations of our dreams are.

title: Interpretation of the number 5 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the number 5 in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: It may seem strange to see the number five in your dream, but in reality seeing the number five in a dream carries many interpretations. In a dream, and in order to learn the interpretation of the number five in a dream, you must watch our article entitled Interpretation of the number 5 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the number 5 in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that the number five in a dream has many interpretations and interpretations that differ depending on the viewer and between the meanings of the number in the dream. Dream: Seeing the number five in a dream can indicate that the dreamer enjoys financial and emotional stability in his life and lives a happy life that satisfies him and satisfies everything in him. A man who sees in his dream that he hears the number repeated repeatedly, then this dream is good news for him that he will be freed from the worry that keeps him. He is alive and may God Almighty rest him in peace. And the young man who sees the figure in his dream, it is good news for him that in the near future he will find a good girl to marry, who will help him in life and a good wife who will help him do good and get close to God Almighty. And the person who sees a number written on The wall: This vision warns him that he will face some problems and difficulties in his life in the coming period, but they will disappear, God willing, and he will be able to overcome them. He must not shake his faith during these experiences and strengthen his relationship with God Almighty, and turn to Him and ask Him to help him overcome these difficulties and restore his peaceful life. Ibn Sirin says: Among the interpretations of a number in a dream is that it indicates the five pillars of Islam, or it indicates the five duties, and it clarifies that of Dreaming of the number five and feeling comfortable is good. He learned that he is one of the saints of their prayers, and that he fears God Almighty, and that if he is late in prayer or neglects it, then this dream is a warning to him from God Almighty to maintain his performance. Pray and stay away from sins and abominations. Interpretation of seeing five silver riyals in a dream: If a married woman sees five coins of any kind in her dream, then this vision symbolizes that she will have many children. When a pregnant woman dreams of five silver riyals in her dream, this dream symbolizes that these The woman will give birth to a female, God willing, and if the riyal is gold, this means that her son will be a male, God willing. Seeing multiples of the number five in a dream, such as fifty, five hundred, five thousand, and so on, indicates the abundance of sustenance and prosperity of life predicted by the dream. Interpretation of the number five In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman is suffering from some problems in her life, then seeing the number in her dream means that she will be able to overcome these problems through solutions and innovations that may be directed to her or told to her by someone. And in interpreting the meaning of the number in the dreams of a married woman It states that she will raise her children, give them a healthy upbringing, work hard for them and do everything she can. An unpleasant dream is for a married woman to see a number written on the wall. This dream means that the dreamer will suffer from various problems in the coming period. The meaning of the number in a dream for a pregnant woman, an interpreter said

title: What is the interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing shoes in one dream. The interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman refers to her lover or husband. If the woman sees in her dream that she is wearing new shoes, this is evidence that she will enter into a new relationship with a new person and will stick to him, if the shoes are beautiful, but If the opposite is the case, then it is evidence of the greed of a man in a woman’s life. Interpretation of a dream about white shoes for unmarried women: The interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman in white varies according to the dream, whether she sees them, wears them, or buys them, and also varies according to the marital status of the dreamer. If Wearing one garment and taking off the other is evidence of separation from a close person, whether a lover, father, brother, or husband. Wearing white shoes in general in a dream is evidence of travel and separation. If a woman sees white shoes in her dream, this is evidence of grace, kindness, and living. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing white shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of someone proposing to marry the dreamer, especially if the shoes have high heels. Taking off shoes in a dream for a woman Single woman Taking off shoes in a dream means getting rid of problems and judgments and surrendering to comfort and reassurance. If a single woman takes off her white shoes in a dream in front of her house, this is evidence that she has moved from her old home to a new home. Also, taking off shoes in a dream indicates separation and abandonment, as it carries meanings Many others, such as victory, change, achieving goals, and achieving goals. Losing shoes in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin indicates that losing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the loss of something valuable to the dreamer. It could be power, influence, prestige, or a person dear to her or a relative, such as the father. And her mother and brother and the mother of her lover. On the other hand, if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is losing her shoe by falling into the sea, this is evidence that her lover will be ill from a serious illness for a long time, but she will recover from it, God willing. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google On an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Black shoes in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is that she is wearing new, shiny black shoes, evidence that she will have a good, pious husband, but if she has dirty dust that needs to be wiped off, this is evidence that she will She marries a person who exposes her to many problems, and her life with him will be full of difficulties. Interpretation of torn shoes in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin indicates that the interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is that her shoes are torn while walking, evidence of a deficiency that is of great importance to insight. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that her soles are torn, this is evidence of her separation from Her lover and her farewell to him. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black shoes for a single woman: Seeing her wearing torn shoes in a dream is evidence that the woman does not care about the society surrounding her and does not care about it. It is also evidence of her piety.

title: Roses in a dream: Interpretation of seeing roses and roses in a dream

preview.html: Roses in a dream represent a person to whom honor or absence belongs. Whoever sees that he chose the answer will win honor and affection. And whoever picks a white rose, he will fall upon a pious woman in whom there is purity, and if the fortuneteller picks up a red rose, he will be struck by a distracted woman, and whoever inhales a yellow rose, he will come to a sick woman. Many roses were accepted and accepted. It was said: Withered roses in a man’s dream mean a woman leaves or dies, a craft fades away, or happiness that does not last. Roses in a dream often indicate good luck. Especially if they are pink or purple, and he may hate roses in dreams if they are blue, black, or grey. Whoever sees a wreath of roses on his head while he is single will get married. Roses show the goodness and purity of a woman. Rose oil shows healing, purity of heart, closeness to people, and softness of the side. In the interpretation, roses, flowers, and wind in a dream came to symbolize women. If she smells it or inhales its scent, she will get married and have a lot of goodness and luck in this marriage. The opening of a ripe rose in general indicates joy and happiness. It was said: Roses in a dream indicate the arrival of a traveler or the arrival of a letter, and if a rose has its tree cut down, it indicates distress and unhappiness. And collecting roses brings victory, profit and demand. Yellow roses indicate sickness and disease, red roses for beauty and adornment, white for money and red for marriage. Roses in a sick person’s dream indicate recovery and the death of anguish. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a single woman. Roses in one’s dream for a man or honor with money, and it is said that roses indicate the arrival of the absent or the return of Beloved. It has been said: Roses represent a groom, or an engaged one, or a marriage that does not take place, or joy that fades away, due to the lack of roses. If she sees in a dream that a young person is paying her, then someone is giving her a promise that does not last. And whoever sees herself alone as if she had a wreath of roses on her head, then she will get married or succeed in her studies. If she sees this during her engagement, then she has a fiancée in this capacity. And roses bloom, a sign of pride in the world, joy, and a heart open to goodness and certainty. A bouquet of roses in one dream is interpreted as a wreath. It is a sign of getting an order, fulfilling a wish, or achieving success. The best person in a dream from whom a single woman can receive a bouquet of roses is her father, brother, grandfather, aunt and uncle. It was said that roses come from incest in a single woman’s dream, and this also indicates marriage, especially if the dreamer is of an age that allows her to do so. Cutting a rose bush in an unmarried girl’s dream is misfortune, picking roses is happiness, and choosing white from his garden to meet a man Pure, dignity, pride and generosity. If the roses are red, her lover or fiancé is cheerful or frivolous. If the rose is yellow, it is illness, disease and some unhappiness. Picking unopened rose buds is evidence of the purity of girls. It has been said that a rose is a good person. Whoever picks a rose with large leaves will fall into deviation, sadness, and unhappiness. Red and white roses are praised in a woman’s sleep, especially if she sees them in a bowl or bowl of water, and roses are praised in visions for their scent, scent, and aroma.
